result.eng: Peel the onion and cut it in slices.
result.ga: bain an craiceann den oinniún agus gearr ina shlisní é
result.orig: bain an craiceann den oinniún agus gearr ina shlisní é
result.html: bain an craiceann den oinniún agus gearr ina shlisní éPeel the onion and cut it in slices.
result.ponchtml: bain an craiceann den oinniún agus gearr ina ẛlisní éPeel the onion and cut it in slices.

result.eng: She will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ga: bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.orig: bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.html: bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ponchtml: bainfiḋ sí an ceann díot má ḟeiceann sí ṫúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!

result.eng: The politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ga: caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.orig: caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.html: caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ponchtml: caiṫfiḋ na polaiteoirí gearraḋ siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.

result.html: gearradh na sreanga teileagraifThe telegraph wires were cut.
result.ponchtml: gearraḋ na sreanga teileagraifThe telegraph wires were cut.

result.html: ghearr mé mo chuid gruaigeI've cut my hair.
result.ponchtml: ġearr mé mo ċuid gruaigeI've cut my hair.

result.ga: tá an t-adhmad gearrtha agam
result.orig: tá an t-adhmad gearrtha agam
result.html: tá an t-adhmad gearrtha agamI've cut the wood.
result.ponchtml: tá an t-aḋmad gearrṫa agamI've cut the wood.

result.eng: She was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ga: buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.orig: buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradh
result.html: buaileadh í roinnt uaireanta agus chuathas i muinín an fhornirt chun a cuid gruaige a bhearradhShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
result.ponchtml: buaileaḋ í roinnt uaireanta agus ċuaṫas i muinín an ḟornirt ċun a cuid gruaige a ḃearraḋShe was hit several times and violence was resorted to to cut her hair.
